'''Racial quotas''' in employment and education represent proportions of minorities that a company or school seeks in hiring, promotion, admissions or graduation.
Note on terminology: many advocates of [[affirmative action]] programs vigorously deny that these programs involves "quotas" -- ''anyone know why this word is so allogenic?''
